price: ពួកគេបានសួរថាៈ តើអ្នកឬដែលបានធ្វើបែបនេះមកលើ ព្រះរបស់ពួកយើងឱអ៊ីព្រហ៊ីម?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
